name: Stichting LIBER
membership: C4C, IFLA, European Internet Forum, Research Data Alliance
goal:
LIBER is the principal organisation representing research libraries in Europe. Its current membership includes 435 national and university libraries in more than 40 countries.

LIBERâ€™s mission is to represent the interests of research libraries of Europe, their universities and researchers. LIBER promotes in particular:

- efficient information services
- access to research information, in any form whatsoever
- innovation in end-user services from research libraries in support of teaching, learning and research
- preservation of cultural heritage
- efficient and effective management in research libraries
interests: Consumers, Culture, Digital economy and society, Education and training, Enlargement, Research and innovation, Single market, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Information Society Directive, Database Directive, Science 2.0, Digital Single Market, Licences for Europe
